item.title: A comparison between Dynamics 365 Finance & Dynamics 365 Business Central
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Max Nguyen)
item.description: Detailed comparison of Dynamics 365 Finance & Supply Chain Management vs Business Central. Choose the right Microsoft ERP solution based on company size, features, and business requirements.
